duties_responsibilities.duty:
Project Lead 
- Responsible for daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, actively participating in scheduling and resource planning, developing item-specific training, coordinating with program and project managers, managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and performing post-project work and data analysis.

Content Expertise 
- Thorough knowledge of science topics used for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science, and an ability to understand and apply state and national science standards.

Logistics and Communication 
- Clear communication via chat, email, phone, posted reports, and videoconference meetings. In-person and virtual interactions with customers and other educators.

Training and Coaching 
- Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, as well as train Science and potentially Math items to a large and varied scorer population.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Additional Math college courses preferred)
Two (2) years assessment industry experience as a Scoring Director or other scoring team lead or equivalent experience
